item.title: Sling URL Resolve
item.author: guilherme@quent.al (Guilherme Quental)
item.description: When we are at the web, acessing pages and content, the URL is the definitive resource which inform what indeed we’re consuming. In the programming world, usually when we’re using languages and technologies such as PHP, Ruby, NodeJS, the URL points out to a script, but in the Sling world, this is different. Content as the protagonist As commented previously, in the Sling world, differently from the main technologies that we see out there, the content is the main entry point of the application.
